fields.name: Bad Smell (Passive):
fields.value: Any visitors are hit with your attack power. If this doesn't kill, permanently reduce their Defense Score by your Attack Score.

fields.name: Allure (1x, charge 125%):
fields.value: All visits to Unseen players will be redirected to you

fields.name: Dangerous glass (Passive):
fields.value: If you die, explode, causing town members to lose .5x Attack and Defense Power tonight
